import axios from 'axios' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import React from 'react' import Logo from "../assets/logo.png" function Team() { const[players, setPlayers] = useState([]) useEffect( () =>{ fetchData() },[]) const fetchData = async () => { const{data} = await axios.get("https://api.jsonbin.io/b/6276a2a1019db46796974e46/4") setPlayers(data) } return (

THE TEAM

{players.map(players =>(

{players.name}

{players.About}

))} {/*
